articles.title: The immune system's fight against the coronavirus - DW (English)
articles.description: A central player in the fight against the novel coronavirus is our immune system. It protects us against the invader and can even be helpful for its therapy. But sometimes it can turn against us.
articles.content:
How does our immune system react to the coronavirus?
